news.title: Non-compliance of orders, hurdles in completion of Unitech projects won't be tolerated: SC
news.para: The Supreme Court is addressing the significant delays caused by state authorities in the Unitech Ltd housing projects. The court has issued a stern warning to those resisting compliance with its directives. To expedite proceedings, it is implementing a prioritized hearing schedule.

news.title: RMZ to invest up to $30 billion in Mumbai region over next 10 years
news.para: RMZ has partnered with MMRDA and CIDCO. This collaboration will bring up to USD 30 billion in investments to the Mumbai Metropolitan Region. The initiative is planned over the next ten years. The company will lead investment structuring and development.

news.title: TVS Emerald raises ₹425 crore equity from IFC for new housing projects
news.para: TVS Emerald has secured Rs 425 crore in equity funding from the International Finance Corporation. This investment will fuel the development of two upcoming residential projects in Chennai and Bengaluru. These projects, set to launch next fiscal, have a combined revenue potential of Rs 4,400 crore.

news.title: We need a housing revolution: Niranjan Hiranandani, chairman, Naredco
news.para: Naredco has urged the government to lower income tax rates for individuals and partnerships.   Proposals include increasing home loan interest deductions and reinstating the Income Tax Settlement Commission.  These measures aim to revive the sector and address housing shortages ahead of the Union Budget 2026.

news.title: Survey of land under NAKSHA starts in Tiswadi
news.para: Land surveys have begun in select Tiswadi taluka areas under the NAKSHA programme, covering Panaji localities like Caranzalem and St Inez, along with Bambolim and Taleigao. Residents are urged to cooperate with survey teams for accurate property mapping. Property owners, including those abroad or renting out, must ensure their rights are correctly recorded during this 10-15 day per zone process.

news.title: PropertyPistol raises ₹25 crore in pre-series B funding
news.para: PropertyPistol has successfully garnered ₹25 crore in a pre-series B financing round, headed by the proficient Ashish Kacholia alongside support from previous investors. This injection of capital is set to accelerate the company’s expansion into Dubai and optimize its distribution channels.

news.title: ASF Insignia raises ₹1,250 crore capital commitment from Alpha Alternatives
news.para: ASF Insignia has landed an investment of around ₹1,250 crore from Alpha Alternatives, earmarked for a state-of-the-art integrated commercial IT office project in Gurugram.

news.title: DLF's net profit up 13.66% in Q3 FY26
news.para: DLF's net profit saw an increase of 13.66 percent for the quarter ending December 31, 2025. Total income also grew by 42.71 percent. The company's gross collections reached ₹5,100 crore for the quarter.

news.title: Bengaluru development body reclaims encroached land worth over ₹700 crore in 14 demolition drives
news.para: The Bangalore Development Authority (BDA) conducted 14 demolition drives between July and December last year, reclaiming over 25 acres of encroached land valued at more than Rs 704.3 crore. These drives targeted unauthorized structures on land acquired for BDA projects, with significant recoveries in JP Nagar 9th Phase. The reclaimed land will be utilized for future BDA projects or auctioned.

news.title: Roha group raises ₹400 crore from private credit investors
news.para: Roha Housing Finance has secured Rs 400 crore from alternative credit investors. This capital will fuel expansion, aiming to grow assets under management to Rs 5,000 crore. The funds are infused as CCD and CCPS, strengthening the company's capital base. This strategic move supports Roha Housing Finance's growth in the affordable housing segment.

news.title: Haryana takes ‘direct’ land purchase route to speed up Millennium City Centre-Cyber City Metro project
news.para: Haryana government has introduced a new policy allowing GMRL to directly purchase private land for the Millennium City Centre-Cyber City Metro corridor through negotiated settlements. Landowners will receive compensation as per the RFCTLARR Act, 2013, plus a 25% incentive, with payments made upfront. This aims to expedite project completion and avoid compulsory acquisition.

news.title: Ludhiana residents slam commercial rezoning, say city ‘crossing the line’
news.para: Ludhiana residents are accusing the municipal corporation of secretly rezoning residential areas into commercial zones, bypassing transparency and public objections. Homeowners in upscale neighborhoods like BRS Nagar and Sarabha Nagar are protesting the move, citing concerns over traffic, infrastructure strain, and a decline in quality of life, while officials remain silent on allegations of procedural misconduct.

news.title: Building plan approval software hit by glitch, Karnataka government suspends online sanctions
news.para: Karnataka State Data Centre has suspended public access to its online land and building plan approval system, Nirman 2.0, due to software glitches and cybersecurity concerns. This suspension is expected to delay approvals for building plans, licenses, and construction permits across urban local bodies for up to three weeks.

news.title: NGT orders probe into ‘illegal resorts, hotels’ in Pilibhit Tiger Reserve
news.para: The National Green Tribunal has formed a committee to investigate alleged illegal construction of resorts and hotels near the Pilibhit Tiger Reserve. This action follows concerns about environmental damage and increased human-wildlife conflict. The committee will inspect sites and report findings to the NGT. The NGT's next hearing is scheduled for April 9.

news.title: Bihar CM sets January 31 deadline for land survey
news.para: In a proactive move, Bihar's Chief Minister Nitish Kumar has initiated a comprehensive campaign to address the backlog of land measurement requests, aiming for a resolution by January 31, 2026. This step is designed to streamline the process, foster transparency, and minimize land conflicts.

news.title: Haryana RERA asks homebuyers to deal only with registered property agents
news.para: Gurugram RERA has issued a crucial advisory for homebuyers and property investors.  It strongly recommends engaging only with real estate agents registered with the Authority.  Dealing with unregistered intermediaries poses significant legal and financial risks.

news.title: SC issues notices to Haryana government, Mahira Buildwell over EWS flat 'fraud'
news.para: The Supreme Court has summoned responses from the Haryana government and Mahira Buildwell concerning allegations of cheating homebuyers in an affordable housing project under the Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana. Homebuyers claim the developer used fraudulent means, including forged bank guarantees, and has completed minimal construction, siphoning off funds.

news.title: Gurugram buyers go to cops, say ‘pressured’ to withdraw FIR against CHD Developers
news.para: Homebuyers of a stalled housing project in Gurugram have approached the Economic Offences Wing (EOW) alleging they are being pressured to withdraw a criminal case. The FIR, filed in 2020, concerns allegations of cheating and conspiracy against CHD Developers Ltd.

news.title: Noida techie died in one, but several construction site pits are death traps in city
news.para: Deep, unsecured trenches on vacant plots across Noida have become death traps, with a recent incident claiming a software engineer's life. These hazardous excavations, often waterlogged and lacking safety measures, pose a significant risk to commuters, especially during low visibility. Authorities have launched drives to identify and address these dangers.

news.title: Anant Raj's profit rises 31% to ₹144 crore in Q3 FY26
news.para: Anant Raj's consolidated net profit surged by 31 percent to Rs 144.23 crore in December quarter. This growth was driven by an increase in total income, which rose to Rs 660.38 crore. The company is a prominent real estate developer focused on residential and data centre projects.
